DOC.brief_summary: The aim study - confirm whether detrusor after-contraction ( DAC ) true contraction new approach - understand clinical implication DAC
DOC.detailed_description: The definition detrusor after-contraction ( DAC ) usually accept increase detrusor pressure ( Pdet ) , whether sudden , cessation urinary flow . The amount increase Pdet sometimes include definition DAC ( 14 , 15 , 20 cmH2O least two time level maximal Pdet void phase ) . However , clear lack well-established definition may induce much bias interpretation clinical implication DAC . The previous study show wide range prevalence.1-4 DAC seem occur frequently child occurrence rate usually decrease age urodynamic study .
DOC.criteria: Indications selection patient conduction urodynamic study ( UDS ) follow recommendation ICS ( international continence society ) . Patients indwell catheter , urinary tract infection urinary stone exclude study
